title: ** Old Judge n172 Production Error  ** Dorgan SGC AUT for Sale - ** SOLD!! **
author: shammus

posts.post_title: ** Old Judge n172 Production Error  ** Dorgan SGC AUT for Sale - ** SOLD!! **
posts.post_content:
"Zero" series n172 Dorgan in an SGC AUT holder.  The card has a neat printing/production error, where the albumen photo when being attached to the stock got folded in the upper left corner, creating uneven borders and a slight shortening of Dorgan's extended arm. 

Any sort of a printing goof out of any 19th century set is insanely scarce....I've seen so few from any of the "N" issues at all.  

Asking $265 

Thanks all!
Brian
[url]redmaccie@hotmail.com[/url]

[IMG]http://www.net54baseball.com/attachment.php?attachmentid=640951&d=1731867969[/IMG]
Bump....dropped price to $395....neat printing / production anomaly that still has a sharp photo!

Hi Peter,

Thanks for the note....I sent you a PM....let me know if you didnt receive it.  Much appreciated!!
